[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1] DISCLAIMER [/h1] [code]I'm not a professional modder, so please report any bugs you find and I'll try my best to fix it![/code]
Currently taking a break from Rimworld modding, so not updating this mod for now.
[h1] What does it do?[/h1] This mod tweaks a few things on the main mod:
[b]Gardener Bot[/b] - Will now do cooking jobs as well - Workspeed increased - Added Cooking skill, set to 20, so it can cook things that require it
[b]Crafting Bot[/b] - Will now do art jobs as well - Workspeed increased - Added Intellectual skill, set to 20, so it can craft things that require it
[b]Hauler Bot[/b] - Carry capacity increased (Can now haul a lot more per trip) - Move speed increased (5x increase from base mod for optimal hauling)
[b]Mining Bot, Cleaner Bot and Construction Bot[/b] - Workspeed increased - Move speed increased - Construction Bot will haul more stuff at once to blueprints
It also adds new bot types (All bots have level 20 skills, just as in the parent mod): [b]ER Bot:[/b] - A robot capable of tending wounds, doing surgeries and fighting fires. [b]BONUS[/b] If [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1787359789]Questionable Ethics Enhanced[/url] is loaded, ER Bot will do Vat Maintaining jobs
[b]Analysis Bot:[/b] - A robot capable of doing research type jobs, such as research itself and operating scanners [b]BONUS[/b] If [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1505914869]What the hack?![/url] is loaded, Analysis Bot will do Hacking jobs If [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2056230561]Preemptive Strike (v1.1 Fork)[/url] is loaded, Analysis Bot will do Recon jobs
[h1] Robots for a few mods [/h1] An Atomic Bot has been added for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1127530465]Rimatomics[/url], for Nuclear jobs A Fisher Bot has been added for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1914064942]Vanila Fishing Expanded[/url], for Fishing jobs A Beekeeper Bot has been added for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1558161673]RimBees[/url], for Beekeeping jobs
[b]These robots will only appear in your game if you have the linked mod activated on your modlist. Otherwise they won't appear anywhere.[/b]
All robots follow the same recipes as the main mod (150 Steel, 30 Plasteel, 100 Gold and 5 Components)
[h1] Credits [/h1] Haplo_X1 - Misc Robots leion247 - Misc Craftable Robots notfood/Charlotte - LoadOnDemand.dll
The textures used for the new bots on this mod are just recolorings of the original mod's bots, with a few tweaks
[h1] Better textures [/h1] I'm no artist. If you want something more visually appealing, I highly recommend using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2140349611]Misc. Craftable Robots Retexture[/url] by gloriousyuri
[h1] Compatibility [/h1] [b]QualitySurgeon[/b] - ERBots will not do surgery with this mod activated
[h1] Dependencies and load order [/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=724602224]Misc Robots[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1409512356]Misc Craftable Robots[/url]. Load after both of them
